name: REBORN (Canceled)
blurb: First Action RPG that fuses Japanese lore with a futuristic cyberpunk western themed Japan created by a small passionate indie team.

rewards.reward: No Reward

【A】SUPPORT TECH
===========================

【1】Thank you for your support! You have our deepest gratitude and we will continue to work hard to make REBORN a reality with you, our support techs in mind!  We invite you to join the REBORN forums where you will be identified as a Kickstarter supporter and be able to discuss the game within our community.

【B】PRIM REBEL
===========================

【2】Digital: Special Thanks on website's credit list
【3】Digital: Receive a high resolution 300dpi (2560 x 1600) concept artwork wallpaper which includes 1 character illustration placed in one of the game’s environments.
===========================

INCLUDES SUPPORT TECH LEVEL REWARDS

【C】HACKER
===========================

【4】Digital: Receive our storyboard concept art.

【5】Digital: Receive our complete character illustration concept art.
===========================

INCLUDES PRIM REBEL LEVEL REWARDS

\u3010C2\u3011GAME ON HACKER\r\n=========================== \u30106\u3011Digital: REBORN game voucher enabling you to be able to download the game when it is available on your choice of platform all subject to availability of the platform based on the achieved stretch goals. This option is region specific.(North America is coming first and EU and Asia will be announced as it becomes available) =========================== DOES NOT INCLUDES HACKER LEVEL REWARDS BUT INCLUDES THE REST ABOVE

【D】EARLY BIRD TECHNICIAN
===========================
【6】Digital: REBORN game voucher enabling you to be able to download the game when it is available on your choice of platform all subject to availability of the platform based on the achieved stretch goals.  This option is region specific.(North America is coming first and EU and Asia will be announced as it becomes available)
===========================
INCLUDES HACKER LEVEL REWARDS

【E】ENGINEER
===========================
【7】Digital: Have your name added to REBORN’s ending credits 'Special Thanks' section.
【8】Physical: Receive a free high quality REBORN T-Shirt (XL, L, M and S).
【9】Digital: Receive the making-of REBORN DVD
【10】Physical: Receive your Collector’s Edition box that will be signed by all of the key developers of REBORN.
===========================
INCLUDES EARLY BIRD TECHNICIAN LEVEL REWARDS

【F】PHYSICIST
===========================
【11】Digital: Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) - in-game weapon (Double Bladed Bizen-Osafune)
===========================
INCLUDES ENGINEER LEVEL REWARDS

【G】MASTERMIND
===========================
【12】Digital: Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) - in-game Jet Speedster.
===========================
INCLUDES PHYSICIST LEVEL REWARDS

【H】TAKEDA CLAN
===========================
【13】Digital: Receive a Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) in-game alternative costume.
【14】Physical: Kickstarter exclusive - storybook of REBORN including a colorful illustration of the prologue.
===========================
INCLUDES MASTERMIND LEVEL REWARDS

【I】UESUGI-CLAN
===========================
【15】Physical: Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) augmented artbook (32 pages, soft cover).
【16】Physical: Receive a high resolution A1-Size poster.
【17】Physical: Receive the DRM-free soundtrack
===========================
INCLUDES TAKEDA-CLAN LEVEL REWARDS

【J】SANADA-CLAN
===========================
【18】Digital: Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) - in-game DLC character with entirely new gameplay/animations
【19】Physical: Kickstarter exclusive - augmented artbook *Autographed (32 pages, book-cover)
===========================
INCLUDES UESUGI-CLAN LEVEL REWARDS

【K】TOKUGAWA-CLAN
===========================
【20】Physical: Musical Score (Game's Main Theme - Printed in A4) *Autographed
【21】Physical: Receive the blade master Musashi Miyamoto in a high quality 1:6 scale deluxe statue. 
===========================
INCLUDES SANADA-CLAN LEVEL REWARDS

【L】DEVELOPER DATE-CLAN
===========================
【22】Digital: Gain access to our private Developer Discussions/Forums
【23】Digital: Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) - possibility of all areas unlocked in Neo-Tokyo at launch.
【24】Physical: Kickstarter exclusive - augmented gate card indicating your developer status on REBORN.
【25】Digital: Have your name be listed as a Developer in REBORN’s credits.  
【26】Digital: Be immortalized and have your name placed inside the world of REBORN.
===========================
INCLUDES TOKUGAWA-CLAN LEVEL REWARDS

【M】NINJA
===========================
【27】Digital: You will aid our developers in creating the look and feel of a prominent Neo-Tokyo Cyber Jazz Bar Non-Player Character.
【28】Digital: Receive a high resolution A1-size poster of Non-Player Character with the background of the Cyber Jazz Bar you helped to create with our developers.
===========================
INCLUDES DEVELOPER DATE-CLAN LEVEL REWARDS

【N】RONIN
===========================
【29】Digital: You will aid our developers in creating the look and feel of a prominent ‘Black-Clinic’ NPC that will be in charge. 
【30】Digital: You will also receive the framed A1-size poster of the NPC which you will help our developers create with the environment of the Black-Clinic in the background.
===========================
INCLUDES NINJA LEVEL REWARDS

【O】SHINOBI
===========================
【31】Physical: Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) - Visit and tour of the famous House of Moves and get to watch a live mocap session from REBORN.
【32】Digital: Kickstarter exclusive - You will receive a DVD B-Roll footage of your mocap session.
===========================
INCLUDES RONIN LEVEL REWARDS

【P】SHOGUN
===========================
【33】Digital: Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) - Have your face in-game.
【34】Physical: Receive REBORN script *Autographed
【35】Physical: You will receive an invitation to the internal developer’s launch party and press event in San Francisco, California 
【36】Physical: Visit the developer and you will get to play the pre-master version, give feedbacks
(Transportation and accommodations not included).
===========================
INCLUDES SHINOBI LEVEL REWARDS

【Q】ZEN LORD
===========================
【37】Physical: Kickstarter exclusive (KSE) - Visit and tour of the famous House of Moves and get to live mocap your choice of one of the characters from REBORN and receive the 3D model reference sheet.
===========================
INCLUDES SHOGUN LEVEL REWARDS

【R】DEMI-GOD
===========================
【38】Digital: Design a major Non-Playable Character and receive a 3D printed model of a character of your choice, the 3D model reference sheet, and a framed concept art of the character you chose with a background and upon your request have it autographed by the entire development team.
【39】Digital: In addition, you will receive an invitation to the internal developer’s launch party, and get an exclusive VIP access to all of the conventions and events for REBORN!  (Transportation and accommodations are not included).
===========================
INCLUDES ZEN LORD LEVEL REWARDS

【S】GOD
===========================
【40】Digital: Design a hidden boss character and receive a 3D printed model of a character of your choice, the 3D model reference sheet, and a framed concept art of the character you chose with a background and upon your request have it autographed by the entire development team.
【41】Digital: In addition, you will get to sit in with the developers at the studio, have dinner with the developers, receive an invitation to the internal developer’s launch party, and get an exclusive VIP access to all of the conventions and events for REBORN! (Transportation and accommodations are not included).
===========================
INCLUDES ZEN LORD LEVEL REWARDS
